      • setImplicitDBConstraints

        public void setImplicitDBConstraints(ImplicitDBConstraintsReader userConstraints)
        Sets the implicit db constraints, i.e. primary and foreign keys not in the database Must be called before the call to initialize
        Parameters:
        userConstraints -

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        This method leads to the reasoner being initalized, which includes the call to Quest.setupRepository: connecting to the database, analyzing mappings etc. This must be called before any queries are run, i.e. before getQuestConnection.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface org.openrdf.repository.Repository
        Overrides:
        initialize in class SesameAbstractRepo
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException

      • getQuestConnection

        public QuestDBConnection getQuestConnection()
                                     throws OBDAException
        Returns a connection which can be used to run queries over the repository Before this method can be used, initialize() must be called once.
        Specified by:
        getQuestConnection in class SesameAbstractRepo
        Throws:
